topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54010ffd6368724971dc0100#post_54010ffd6368724971dc0100
I know we're going a bit off topic, but one of the best things about touhou is that it's a franchise that has given us over a hundred positive female characters in one single franchise in which all of the characters are clearly distinct from each other and have their own distinct personalities.

To prove my point Squiggy let's play name that character!  *gameshow music* I'll list off character traits and you name the character.
1)Wicket hermit
2)Buddhist jesus
3)Strongest
4)Bird brain
5)Thief
6)Asthmatic bookworm
7)Lazy guard
8)Pad- *knifed*
9)Wants to "play"; extremely destructive
10)Her precious thing was stolen
11)Gardener swordswoman
12)Sings even though nobody wants to hear her sing; danger: blindness
13)Her horns will cave you
14)Scam artist bunny
15)Schoolgir- I mean ex-military
16)Fastest news reporter
17)Lazy death god
18)Shy; loves humans
19)Very jealous
20)Massive drunk; will knock you the fuck out
21)Doesn't know how to show emotions with her face
22)Now this is the story all about how my life got flipped upside down now I'd like you take a moment and tell you how I told lies to get to turn things upside down.
